flashcards.english: Verb 'Hûra' - multiple meanings: beat, iron, wash, start, call
flashcards.notes: Versatile verb with context-dependent meanings. Base: Hûra (beat/strike). Benefactive: Hûrîra (do for someone). Reflexive: Wîhûrîre (do for yourself). Meanings depend on object: clothes, car, phone, etc.
examples: Hûrîra nguo bathi (Iron clothes for me)
Wîhûrîre nguo bathi (Iron clothes for yourself)
Nî ngwîhûrîra bathi (I will iron for myself)
